Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Drama | Thriller
Status: New Series
Network: ABC ( USA)
Airs: Thursdays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: February 14, 2013
Episode Order: 13

Written and executive-produced by Paul Scheuring, Zero Hour is the tale of a skeptics magazine editor who gets pulled into one of the most compelling conspiracies in human history. Lorenzo DiBonaventura and Dan McDermott are also attached to executive-produce. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/Zero_Hour)
